alert.note: Alert for Adams; Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 06 at 8:26PM CDT until April 12 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi...Louisiana... Mississippi River At Natchez affecting Adams, Concordia and Wilkinson Counties. For the Lower Mississippi River ...including Arkansas City, Greenville, Vicksburg, Natchez...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River At Natchez. * WHEN...Until Wednesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 47.5 feet. - Forecast...The river will above flood stage early Saturday morning, and crest at 48.5 feet early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 48.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Mississippi River Natchez 48.0 47.5 Thu 8 pm CDT 47.9 48.3 48.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 830 AM CDT.
